Text:
Thanks for the upload. Nice to find the season in one download. Especially with no added junk in the download.

Shame there are no comments with over 700 seeders and leechers.

I have found it difficult to find working subs because of the number of releases from different ppl.

thanks man!....id much rather have to replace the mkv files than have to DL and re-encode an entire season....eveyone else seems to be obsessed with 1080p and 15 gig files!....very refreshing, thanks!!!

are the subtitles for the season 4 available yet?

great torrent btw
Many Thanks - Is there going to be a Season 05 ?
